com.example.dada.Controller

类 TaskController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.dada.Controller.TaskController

  • public class TaskController
extends java.lang.Object
    Request model's controller, a glue between Activity and Model. Give access for activity(View) to modify and update model.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      OnAsyncTaskCompleted listener
      The Listener, callback method when the async task is done
      OnAsyncTaskFailure offlineHandler 

    • 构造器概要

      Instantiates a new Request controller.
      TaskController(OnAsyncTaskCompleted listener, OnAsyncTaskFailure offlineHandler)
